synopsis.text: While battling the forces of darkness as a half-demon, half-human, Dante runs a unique business called 'Devil May Cry,' specializing in exterminating demon-related problems. Equipped with his reliable sword, Rebellion, and his pair of guns, Ebony and Ivory, Dante takes on missions that often lead him to face off against malevolent demons. When he is hired to protect Patty Lowell, a young girl and the last heir of a wealthy family, Dante discovers that his latest assignment is not as simple as it seems. As he delves deeper into the case, he must confront hordes of demons, navigate complex relationships with other hunters, and adapt to his newfound responsibility of caring for Patty. Based on the popular video game series, this thrilling anime combines intense action and intriguing storylines to keep viewers on the edge of their seats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
